name: Border closure 边境封闭
description: This is an action role-playing game, you need to play Zhou Xin, secretly assign the resistance army and fight to the enemy , to explore the vast world of Bashu, to unit your forces everywhere, wandering in the geography wastelade, and pick up anything to upgrade your equipment.
minimum_requirements: OS: windows 7 Processor: Intel Pentium G3258 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce GT 640 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 512 MB available space Sound Card: Motherboard integration Additional Notes: none
recommended_requirements: OS:  Processor:  Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics:  DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space
